block.p: * AssetTrade, King of Prussia, Pa., an asset management company that is a joint venture of Henry Butcher International and Michael Fox International, to the Weightman Group, Philadelphia, and the Technology Marketing Group, Conshohoken, Pa., to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at more than $20 million.

* AssetTrade, King of Prussia, Pa., an asset management company that is a joint venture of Henry Butcher International and Michael Fox International, to the Weightman Group, Philadelphia, and the Technology Marketing Group, Conshohoken, Pa., to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at more than $20 million.

* Hudson's Bay Company, Toronto, to Wolf Group Canada, Toronto, as the first agency of record to handle its retail division, the Bay. Billings were estimated at more than $15 million. * Cidco Inc., Morgan Hill, Calif., which offers telephone and Internet appliances, products and services, to Euro RSCG DSW Partners, Salt Lake City and San Francisco, part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising, to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at more than $15 million. * Oddzon, Napa, Calif., a unit of Hasbro that sells toys like Nerf and Koosh, to Towne Silverstein Rotter, New York, to handle its account, which had been at Griffin Bacal, New York, part of the Omnicom Group. Spending was estimated at $10 million to $15 million.
